column4: I don't mean to be forward but there is customer data on a laptop with a linux installation that is giving me the unable to mount root error I listed above.   MY job could be on the line.  Any help is welcome.
Perhaps it is an error that no-one knows how to fix?
or it is a Linux bug
maybe , but if you have alive-cd handy youmight be able to mount the drive/partition with : sudo mount /dev/sdX /mnt  ..X being the partion
